name: Surviving in a Romance Fantasy Novel
author: 코리타
content: One day, Seo Tae-pyung ended up transmigrating as the younger brother of the heroine in the fantasy romance novel Celestial Love. As romantic as this place is supposed to be, he was too busy just trying to adapt to his new life!Romance? Yeah, right! His goal was to keep a low profile and live quietly. But then... &quotHow could you make the crown princess fall for you of all people?!&quotAt that point, he had no idea. He was only just beginning to scrape the surface of this bizarre turn of event
